Articles.Content: When a kerbal or multiple kerbals are recoverd from a craft that lands on Kerbin, they disappear from the roster for ever. Some kerbals come back but most don’t. I sent a bug report and I’m just warning people.
Try checking other vehicles in that workspace, it's possible that they're in other vehicles.

22 minutes ago, DaUnRealN00B said:

Try checking other vehicles in that workspace, it's possible that they're in other vehicles.

That's what I figure: they're somehow stuck in the garage.  

Still - its weird that I can no longer find Jeb or Val; they used to be so reliable!
